class.name: CVTrackerDaSiamRPN
class.description: Updates the position of a bounding box in order to track an object in a video. [url=https://docs.opencv.org/4.x/d9/df8/group__tracking.html]More information here[/url].

method.name: create
method.description:
Creates an instance of the tracker.
[u]Additional parameters:[/u] backend: Int, kernel_cls1: String, kernel_r1: String, model: String, target: Int

method.name: init
method.description: Initialize the tracker with a known bounding box that surrounded the target.

method.name: update
method.description: Updates the tracker, find the new most likely bounding box for the target.
